data.text:
Jonas Max Ferris is a financial adviser, journalist, and economic analyst. Additionally, he is a panellist on Fox Business Network and the producer of If the Trees Could Talk. The successful media personality is known to many as the husband of Dagen McDowell, a Fox Business analyst.

Jonas Max Ferris started his career in finance many years ago. He is a seasoned financial advisor and economic analyst. Discover more about his life and career today.

Jonas Max Ferris' biography

Jonas Max Ferris is an economic analyst, journalist, financial advisor, and producer. He is best known as Dagen McDowell's husband.

How old is Jonas Max?

The economic analyst is 51 years old as of June 2023. He was born on 13th September 1971, and his Zodiac sign is Virgo.

Where does Jonas Max Ferris live?

The economic analyst lives in Virginia, United States of America, with his spouse. He was born in Southfield, Massachusetts, United States of America, and raised in Greenwich Village, New York City. His nationality is American, and his ethnicity is White.

Where did Jonas Max Ferris go to college?

After completing his high school education, the economic analyst attended Manhattan College. He pursued a degree in Economics and graduated in 1993.

After graduating from Manhattan College, he worked for a while. He later enrolled at the University of Georgia's Business School, from which he graduated in 1997.

Career

The economic analyst worked for Bull & Bear Fund, a global macro fund that helps clients manage their assets wisely. He also worked with the American Heritage Fund before joining the media industry.

Jonas Max Ferris came into the limelight when he made his television debut in 2002. He appeared on the Fox Business Network, a channel that mainly covers business news.

After making a few appearances on Fox Business Network, he became a panellist in Cashin' In, a business analysis show. He and other panellists talked about various business-related topics, including guidance on stock investments.

The economic analyst is the co-founder and president of MAXfunds.com. He founded the website with his classmate, Jason Burr, whom he met at the University of Georgia.

The website offers financial advice to people who wish to join the business field. The two also use the website to guide their followers on funds investments.

Besides all the above, Ferris is a producer. He was the co-executive producer of the short film If the Trees Could Talk. He has also appeared as a panellist and contributor on various television programmes, as shown below.

What is Jonas Max Ferris' net worth in 2023?

Jonas Max Ferris' net worth is $5 million as of 2023. He has made his wealth from his career in finance and television. On the other hand, Dagen Mcdowell's net worth is $5 million.

Is Jonas Max Ferris married?

Yes, the economic analyst, journalist, financial advisor, and producer is married to Dagen McDowell. He first met his wife on Cashin' In.

The two were selected to argue and choose mutual funds on the show. They started dating in 2001 and eventually got married in 2005. They had a small wedding attended by close friends and family.

Who is Jonas Max Ferris married to?

Jonas Max Ferris' wife is Dagen McDowell. Who is Jonas Max Ferris' wife? McDowell is a seasoned journalist who anchors and co-hosts The Bottom Line on Fox Business. She is also a commentator and guest host on Fox News.

She joined Fox News Channel (FNC) in 2003. Throughout her tenure, she has provided financial commentary and analysis on different FOX News Media programmes.

Before meeting the financial advisor, McDowell was married to a man whose name remains undisclosed in the public domain. The union ended in 2003.

Jonas Max Ferris' health

There have been rumours that the economic analyst is sick. However, he is yet to confirm or dismiss the allegations in public.

How tall is Jonas Max Ferris?

The economic analyst is 5 ft 6 in or 168 cm tall and weighs about 123lb or 56 kg. He has dark brown hair and eyes.

Trivia

Interestingly, the financial advisor's parents are both artists with no interest in the business sector.

He wanted to become an actor in his childhood.

He has pet dogs named Dale and Charlie.
